# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value. It's not just an item; it's a solution designed to enhance your daily life or work experience. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I believe we can come to an agreement that is mutually beneficial. I kindly invite you to consider purchasing it for $120. Thank you for your time and consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
